testcase.name: Testing the checkout page functionality for valid users

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given Existing Valid User opens browser.....................................passed When Existing Valid User goes to "https://demo.broadleafcommerce.org/" website.passed Then Existing Valid User hovers to sign_in_link.............................passed Then Existing Valid User clicks sign_in_link................................passed Then Existing Valid User enters username and password in login text fields..passed Then Existing Valid User clicks on submit button............................passed Then Existing Valid User is taken to member page............................passed Then Existing Valid User enters text in search field........................passed Then Logged in User chooses the selection from search box field.............passed Then Logged in User filters the selection by choosing price range...........passed Then Logged in User clicks on a selection from search result................passed Then Logged in User clicks add to cart......................................passed Then Logged in User goes to view cart page..................................passed Then Logged in User goes to checkout page...................................passed And User increases the number of selected items to two......................passed Then Logged in User fills in shipping information and clicks Continue.......pending Then Logged in User fills in payment information............................skipped Then Logged in User gets purchase confirmation notification.................skipped Then Logged in User logouts.................................................skipped Then Logged out User closes browser.........................................skipped
